name: The International Conference on Green Technology and Energy Engineering
content: The International Conference on Green Technology and Energy Engineering (GTEE 2024) will take place in Bali, Indonesia during Oct. 31-Nov. 2, 2024.GTEE 2024 provides a communion platform to explore the potential of energy engineering and green technology, as well as its ethical and social implications. We are pleased to invite you to submit high-quality original research and technical contributions for presentation in GTEE 2024 to share your latest research results with other researchers from all over the world. Papers will be selected through a review process. After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted to Engineering Village, Scopus and other databases for review and indexing.
